    mootools 1.2 cheat sheet

    less than 1 minute read

    The Javascript Framework mootools recently hit the „advance“ button and so mootools 1.2 was published! It comes along with great new features and speed improvements.

    For your coding pleasure, i just updated my cheat sheet to the new revision. It includes cheat sheet like documentation for Core, Native, Class, Element, Utilities and Request. I’ll launch another cheatsheet which will cover FX and Plugins soon.

    Enjoy!

    Download as PDF (increased contrast – printer friendly)

    Download mootools 1.2 cheat sheet (*.pdf, 80kB)

    Did this work save you time and money?

    Thanks!
